mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password, nickname, loginType) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, COALESCE(#{loginType}, 'SYSTEM'))
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET deleted_at = NOW(), email = CONCAT('deletedUser_', id, '_', UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())), nickname = CONCAT('deletedUser_', id, '_', UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())), password = NULL WHERE id = #{userId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
